title: Analyze particle motion, given velocity part - a

content.description: A particle moves along the x-axis so that its velocity at time t ,0 ≤ t ≤ 5 , is given by v(t) = 3(t−1)(t−3) . At time t =2 , the position of the particle is x(2)=0 .
content.question: Find the minimum acceleration of the particle

frqParts.text: Find the minimum acceleration of the particle

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
